TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SelectBlockSyntax extends Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.ExecutableStatementSyntax
Public NotInheritable Class SelectBlockSyntax Inherits ExecutableStatementSyntax

Docs.summary: Represents a Select Case block, including the Select Case that begins it, the contains Case blocks and the End Select.
